item.title: Data Mesh -
item.description: Not such a new concept after all? I don’t think that I have to tell much about the recent developments on Data Mesh (see this and that), the world doesn’t need another “Data Mesh introduction” article just to tell these things again. But when we dig deeper into that topic and look on the Data Product there might be some similarities ringing a bell. We’ll come to this later. But how is a Data Product defined(by Zhamak?
